tool.name: imagemetadata

method.name: close
method.shortdescription: Close the image metadata tool. Synonym for done().
method.description: This function closes the image metadata tool. This means that it detaches the tool from its underlying metadata object. Methods cannot be run on it until it is opened with another or the same image.

method.name: done
method.shortdescription: Close the image metadata tool. Synonym for close().
method.description: This function closes the image metadata tool. This means that it detaches the tool from its underlying metadata object. Methods cannot be run on it until it is opened with another or the same image.

method.name: list
method.shortdescription: Get a dictionary of FITS-like header items.

param.name: verbose
param.description: If true, print listing to logger

method.description: Get a listing of traditional FITS-like "header" items.
method.example: imd.open("myim.im") mylist = imd.list(False) imd.done() crval1 = mylist{"crval1"}

method.name: open
method.shortdescription: Open this image metadata tool providing access to an image's metadata.

param.name: infile
param.description: Image name. The image can be in any \casa\ supported format.

method.description: This method creates access to the specified image's metadata.
method.example: immd.open("myim.im") # do stuff with the tool and then close it. immd.done()
